name: Britt & the Tooth (Mobile & Desktop)
description:
*Follow my twitch channel: nolashgirl 

HOW TO PLAY: *Don't recommend using Safari*

1-Move Britt with your mouse. 

2-Use tray as paddle for the tooth/ball.

**Game is free to play! My purpose of making these games are for people to laugh and have fun playing them. Developing games do take time and I fully invest my time in making sure they're enjoyable. For that reason, I take donations if anyone would like to support me but certainly not a  requirement! 

Paypal: https://www.paypal.com/donate/?hosted_button_id=NF4968MVMEFGN appreciate all the support and anyone trying out my games :)

(Character art made by Nahuel Tajes. Follow him on instagram at: @n_edv15)
